dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1265 IH: To amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to expand eligibility for certain wastewater infrastructure grants, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act to expand eligibility for certain wastewater infrastructure grants, and for other purposes.

section.header: Wastewater infrastructure and trash-free waters grants
section.text: Section 302 of the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act (33 U.S.C. 4282) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting States, before municipalities; and
by inserting a comma before or Indian Tribes; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d)(1), by inserting States, before units of local government.
